title: NormalBits
author: NormalBits
content: Hello Im NormalBitsIm new guy in Crypto & BTC worldWhat is the important things that i need to know about crypto & BTCI'm PYTHON,PHP,JS,C Coder ,How can this be useful for me

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Since you are here in the forum then you should read the pinned threads especially forum rules.What you need to know about crypto is how blockchain works and you should also have to know how to send crypto snd receive. You should choose a wallet that is up to your liking and how to choose good wallet provider. Better choose the wallet that isn't custodial. There is a saying in crypto that goes "not your keys not your coin". Try checking the thread called Beginners & Help Encyclopedia. You can find it searching in google and make sure you add Bitcointalk at the end of your search.

comments.author: Dextro1
comments.body: Just like me, I'm also new to the cryptocurrency and Bitcoin world. I also made a thread about me being new here just like you just did and I got some information which helped me.I will share them with you but Incase they are insufficient you can always ask questions here[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5276341[3] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5464746.0

comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: Sorry, but if I could get you straight.. did you just say you're a tech in all this programming languages?? If yes, are you seriously asking us how to utilize 'em?...lol assuming that wasn't what you meant, there's actually alot to learn in the crypto space.. the likes of all the languages you mentioned doesn't even come in for a beginner like you... All you need to understand now is the primary/basic orientation... Follow the link above to clear your thoughts on whether you actually wanna start your said journey.Sandra üßë‚Äçü¶∞

comments.body: Quote from: NormalBits on October 27, 2023, 06:28:33 PMHello Im NormalBitsIm new guy in Crypto & BTC worldWhat is the important things that i need to know about crypto & BTCYou are welcome to bitcointalk. All cryptocurrencies discussions take place here. You have found the safest platform to learn cryptocurrency. However, you need to know the rules and regulations that guide us here before you start doing anything to avoid making mistakes that you may not know, so for that, you can click newbies read before posting After reading that click learnmeabitcoin to easy your learning mate.NOTE: ¬†Don't plagiarise for this forum; it‚Äôs one of the biggest offences newcomers make to get their account permanently banned from the forum. Don‚Äôt copy someone's content or from any other place and claim it as your own.

comments.author: AYOBA
comments.body: Quote from: NormalBits on October 27, 2023, 06:28:33 PMHello Im NormalBitsIm new guy in Crypto & BTC worldWhat is the important things that i need to know about crypto & BTCI'm PYTHON,PHP,JS,C Coder ,How can this be useful for me¬†Welcome to this amazing forum, mate. This is the just beginning of your trip. Allow this to be your first adventure. This is the right moment for you to take time out of your hectic schedule to learn how to use this forum. The more you learn that's how you know about cryptocurrencies, blockchain technology, and how they work, the better you will understand them.Furthermore, their rules and regulations are provided by this forum; try to read them all as much as possible so that you can know how to live here without any problems, and you can also go over the pasted threads for to further you your learning, You can click on this link is all about rules and guidelines.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0

comments.author: bhadz
comments.body: Welcome to the forum I've noticed quickly the coding languages that you're good at. You can use that to offer your skills in the Services[1] section and ask to get paid in Bitcoin. There are many projects that I have seen that they're looking for a coder but I am not sure if those that you've mentioned is what they look for as their PL.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0

comments.body: Quote from: bhadz on October 27, 2023, 11:45:24 PMWelcome to the forum I've noticed quickly the coding languages that you're good at. You can use that to offer your skills in the Services[1] section and ask to get paid in Bitcoin. There are many projects that I have seen that they're looking for a coder but I am not sure if those that you've mentioned is what they look for as their PL.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0For now, he can roam around this forum as he is lucky, he stumbled on this hidden gem. He can offer his services once he got acquainted more about this market and the needs of the people working on this community.Reading threads after threads in this forum will give him so much knowledge and he will soon find out what niche he wants to explore with.So congratulations to OP for finding this forum. Don't rush as you can learn a lot from this forum.

comments.body: Quote from: Dextro1 on October 27, 2023, 07:26:22 PMJust like me, I'm also new to the cryptocurrency and Bitcoin world. I also made a thread about me being new here just like you just did and I got some information which helped me.I will share them with you but Incase they are insufficient you can always ask questions here[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5276341[3] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5464746.0Wow I must confess the rules here are very strict, I am new here.from the way I see things here I think it will take quite a long time to understand how this forum works. comments.author: mk4
comments.body: It depends ‚Äî what aspect of bitcoin/crypto are you actually interested in?Always remember that most of Bitcoin/crypto is open-source. So whatever app category you're interested in, just go to their website and check their open-source code.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: Pi-network314159 on October 28, 2023, 01:11:17 AMWow I must confess the rules here are very strict, I am new here.from the way I see things here I think it will take quite a long time to understand how this forum works.Violating many of the rules will only get you a slap on the wrist and nothing more. For you to get more serious punishments you need to break one of three rules;‚Ä¢ Steal someone else's content and pass it off as yours,‚Ä¢ Excessively spam the forum despite repeated warnings,‚Ä¢ Share malwares.The above rules are not broken in ignorance, so if you have no plan toncheat the system you will be fine here.To understand how the forum works you have to interact more with it, join discussions and try out the available features. Visit the Help option for assistance.

You need to understand how this forum all about cause once you've done a mistakes then you will be face the consequences and all I can say is good luck to your journey if you are here because you want to learn more about cryptocurrency and Bitcoin then one thing for sure you¬† are in right place cause here in forum you can learn all you want to learn all you need is to use the search botton.

comments.author: aylabadia05
comments.body: Quote from: NormalBits on October 27, 2023, 06:28:33 PMIm new guy in Crypto & BTC worldWhat is the important things that i need to know about crypto & BTCBefore wanting to know important things about Bitcoin and crypto, it is very important to know your goal in learning important things about Bitcoin and crypto.The purpose, how it works and the benefits contained in Bitcoin that you need to know. After knowing this, move on to the purpose, how it works and the benefits found in crypto.Quote from: NormalBits on October 28, 2023, 08:41:44 AMQuote from: Sandra_hakeem on October 27, 2023, 08:19:15 PM[snip]you didn't understand meI meant How can I benefit from it in crypto The way to do this is to prepare time to read everything related to what you want. Then examine it with reality.All available if internet is still available.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: NormalBits on October 28, 2023, 08:41:44 AMyou didn't understand meI meant How can I benefit from it in crypto Are you asking how to use your programming skills to benefit from cryptocurrencies? Simply. Cryptocurrencies are money. So like with regular money, you can trade your programming services for crypto payments.¬† Though to really cash in, you'd want to build blockchain apps.¬† That means first getting pretty deep into cryptocurrencies and related tech.¬† Could be a big learning curve if it's all new to you!

comments.author: Mayor of ogba
comments.body: Welcome to the great bitcointalk forum, If you find yourself in a new place learn the rules and regulations governing that place to enable you to understand how things are done there. I recommend you go through the rules and regulations provided to you above by some reputable members of this forum and also take them seriously. One thing you need to know when it comes to crypto is not to store your Bitcoin in a centralized exchange like Binance because you can wake up one day and find out you do not have access to it. After all, it is not your key and also not your coin, you can store your Bitcoin in a non-custodial wallet that gives only you access to your fund because that is why Bitcoin was designed. Also, don't allow anybody to get access to your seed phrase or private key because if any gets hold of it that person can move your Bitcoin to another wallet
